songs.title: Megalomania
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Paradise comes at a price that I am not prepared to pay
What were we built for? Could someone tell me please
The good news is she can't have babies and won't accept gifts from me
What are they for? They'll just grow up and break the laws you've loved

[Hook]
Take off your disguise
I know that underneath it's me

Who are you oooh

[Verse 2]
Useless device, it won't suffice
I want a new game to play
When I am gone it won't be long before I disturb you in the dark
And paradise comes at a price that I am not prepared to pay
What were we built for? Will someone tell me please

[Hook]
Take off your disguise
I know that underneath it's me
